title: B[y] vertue of holy obedyence openly ...
author: Catholic Church. aut
notes: Indulgences to contributors towards the redemption of the children of "Lady Isabet lascarina", from the Turks. In English--STC.
Identified as STC 15473 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect; cropped at head, affecting text (the "y" in "By" is conjectured).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
